name: Stani Kulechov
description:
Stani Kulechov  

Stani Kulechov is a pioneer in decentralized finance (DeFi) and web3 social. He is the Founder and CEO of Avara, a leading software technology company, building products based on blockchain technologies that serve users, creatives, and developers. The company developed Aave â€“ one of the largest and most popular DeFi protocols in the world, Aave-native stablecoin GHO, and Lens Protocol. The company's vision is a people powered internet the benefits all.
